post.body: nicole, monica, the kids (selena & papas), maybe even melissa..visit leticia (hang out w/my other fam), mikee, wendy & wii
i'll make an agenda for you :-P
museums, movies, beach, visit cuzns
i want to do better things than watch tv over vacation
i only have season 1
maybe we should breed our chairs & get at least 1 functional chair :)
plus i need something to make the time fly, i'm hungry and that seems to make the time go by even slower!
because i don't remember how the show ended since they so RUDELY cut it when it was a kick ass show
hey...i still do my work
they had to abandon the van and walk to the metrolink (4 miles) & then walk from the metrolink to where they meet in the AM in SNOW
Beautiful! It took my co-worker 9 hours to get home yesterday. Her carpool left at 9:30AM but didn't make it to the 14 in time.
OMG~ are you being stalked??? you're a popular cyberspace girl!
so have a chimichanga! (saying it like Barbara Steisand in Meet The Fockers)
that was all funky..the message. All characters.
I call it the Charlie Brown x-mas funk. :-) just have a glass of wine and unwind.
awww..just take an extra large purse or a diaper bag with room to spare and whoops if some tamales should slip in. Ha ha
it always takes that long. That's why its so annoying that she goes to that place and the job sucks.
there isn't anything I can do about it
its over. The hostage situation is over. Hopefully the helocopters will go away
check channel 9. Saw it on the news at Auntie V's parents house
ABC7 tweet
cuz some man is holding up a Chinese restaurant in el Monte on Santa Anita. I think he's holding just a kid

okay...i'll treat myself..i will work WHILE watching season 3 of v-mars...he, he, he.
so much for the new office! can someone say..CHEAP
I HATE MY CHAIR! I can raise it as high as it will go but it gradually lowers until i'm basically sitting on the ground!
I'm pretty much caught up...notifying all the peeps I need to about my time off..i almost feel like today is the last day! 1.5 days left!
dude...can't believe there is snow on the Vegas strip
looking forward to lunch at el cholo's...not my favorite spot but it's better than the usual places in the village
Sitting in a middle of a mess. I need a bigger bedroom!!

Feliz Navidad! Merry Christmas, Happy Holidays, and many warm season greetings to you and your loved ones!
My toes are cold
I so wish I had a fireplace!
Damn its cold out
Its so nice to see the mountains sans smog. The snow is beautiful!
What an ass! U really try to give people the benefit of the doubt. But this one jerk just keeps on being that..a jerk. Totally uncalled for

My wii injuries have returned
Twas a busy day. Laundry, family pictures, last minute shopping, drop off family and now off to a birthday dinner. Whew!
